<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eternal Bane](/Feats.aspx?ID=4693) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Mortal Herald](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=305) (Level 18)

**Prerequisites**
unholy

</column>

---

Your life has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power. You’re continuously surrounded by a bane spell, with a spell rank equal to half your level (rounded up). The radius is 15 feet, and you can’t increase it. You can Dismiss the spell; if you do, it returns automatically after 1 minute.
name: Eternal Bane
